column3:
There were two messages. The first, sent at 4:55 a.m., was from the campus garage.
"We have your vehicle," the mechanic's voice informed him. "Unfortunately, we had some trouble getting it out of the ditch, and it has sustained a small amount of additional damage."

4:55 - Mank holding phone. Turns to Caddell - "Who is this?"
Caddell: "Jim." (shrugs) "I think he's our man in Cincinnati."
